website_summaries.verdict: If you’re primarily looking for a laptop screen cleaner, this kit works nicely. It ships with two high-quality microfiber cloths at a low price.
pros: Cleaning spray will not leave streaks on laptop screen
Gentle on screen glass for other electronics, too
Reasonably good value, considering the quality of the items included
No ammonia in the cleaner, so it doesn’t have an odor
cons: Does not contain items to help you clean the keyboard
Spray nozzle may leak or drip during use

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE - Destroyed My Screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to clean my laptop screen. Sprayed the included cloth and attempted to clean the screen. It destroyed my screen. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cleaner does NOT mess up MacBooks. Your MacBook is at fault.
customer_reviews.text: Please don't listen to the people who said this ruined their MacBooks screen. Im only writing this review to educate people. First, yes this works great on my 2019 MacBook pro and did not mess the screen up and it doesn't mess up screens. The reason this messed the screens on other people's laptops is because it's a 2011-2014 MacBook problem, not this cleaners problem. Look up #screengate. It was a big mess up on apples part and happened to me back then when I had one too. If you cleaned your MacBook with almost anything the protective film would come off. Quit blaming this cleaner. I appreciate this also came with a microfiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: BR IMAGING

customer_reviews.title: Impressed , Impressed,  Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Well im not big on reviews unless it has a major impact on me. This simple cleaner might have you thinking , there all the same, probably made by the same manufacturer. This is absolutely not true and this was the one that made me believe otherwise. Ive tried it on my tv, tablet, phone, sunglasses and watch. Super impressed! No streaks , no lint , one wipe. The cloth is also amazing. No lint trap and is of high quality. Let me tell you ive tried many brands and of all costs. Waist of money,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to try it out. Totally exceeded my expectations and they use non toxic ingredients (what???). Had a few spots on my TV with little finger prints that I was not able to remove for a year. Used this on it and with some elbow grease, the prints came out. I love that the spray comes with the recommended rags (with matching colors as the pray bottle) so I don't have to go looking for another item. I hope the ladies come up with more cleaning products because I really love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Good on screens, not so good on glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for screens on electronic devices, but the smaller cloth for glasses. First, if you spray the cloth as the instructions direct it doesn't clean the lenses as well as a dry cleaning cloth I got from my optometrist. If you spray directly on the lenses the cloth doesn't slide smoothly across them. I use it on the screens of my tablet, phone, computer and TV and am happy with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: DiYo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all your computer screens Does not leave streaks ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all your computer screens Does not leave streaks or a film. I love the smaller cloth. Fits perfect in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Shannom Jean Evans

customer_reviews.title: EyeglassesSuperHero
customer_reviews.text: I buy this set specifically for eyeglasses and the cloth and spray are truly my best friends. The material of the cloth in this package is way softer then the typical micro fiber one. Its more like the cloth you get when you purchase new eyeglasses. Just a GIANT one which is a huge plus! The cleaner itself I found out because of the bigger bottle that cleans flat screen TVs and more. It works the same and cleans the glass without leaving smears. Have a few and well worth it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: The Best Screen Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best screen cleaner I've used. Just a tiny spritz onto the rag, and you can clean the whole computer screen, plus a phone or two. I've used it on my touch screen laptop, which is matte, and on the phone and Kindle, which both have shiny screen protectors, and they all come squeaky clean with no streaks or smears. It's a bit pricey, but the fact that you have to use so little of it makes it a decent value. Comes with a small cloth for most things, but also has a giant cloth for those monster TVs. Definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wish I Had a Pineapple

customer_reviews.title: and that time I tried to clean it but only made it much worse. I ordered this based on the number of ...
customer_reviews.text: My mac screen was a disaster. Years of grit, fingerprints, and that time I tried to clean it but only made it much worse. I ordered this based on the number of good reviews and it didn't disappoint. At first I thought it wasn't working but then I realized I just had THAT much dirt on my screen. This stuff works like a charm and now I can't wait to use it on my husband's computer, our Ipad and our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Suslow

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep in my laptop bag. Fits nicely in one of the smaller compartments, and ensures that my screen will always be clean. Great marketing and brand design too! I kept thinking I needed my wife to help with my screen because she is good at keeping things clean and wa-lah, the "Screen Mom" was welcomed into my life. Thanks for a great product! I am much happier, and working from my laptop daily makes your product that much more valuable!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: 2019 MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 MacBook Pro, and I was worried about purchasing this product after seeing multiple reviews claiming that it "ruined" other MacBook screens. These worries were put to rest after reading another user's review explaining that older MacBook screens have defective films on them. The instructions were very easy to follow, and my Macbook looks brand new! I can't recommend this product enough!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item!
customer_reviews.text: I had some smears on my flat screen tv that soap and water would not remove. I used this item next and my screen looks like it came out of the box brand new. I also used it in my laptops, iPad, iPhone, in car touch screen and other tv’s and brought those screens back to being new from the original first day of purchase. Highly recommended item to have. Also came with two different size cloths. One for tv and one for small screens.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This Product Cleans It All
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It was so easy to use...just spray on the provided cloth and rub the surface of what you are cleaning. I used it on my flat screen TV, phone, tablet, and eye glasses. Everything came out crystal clear! And there was no harsh chemical smell. I bought the small size to try it, but I will definitely purchase the regular size, and recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jenten

customer_reviews.title: waste of money, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I really don't understand the 5 star reviews here, they must be fake. This is not a screen cleaner. All it did was leave a residue all ver my device which now I have to go buy a REAL screen cleaner to take care of. It's an amazon choice for a reason. Its cheap and doesn't work just like everything else that is an "amazon choice". DO NOT BUY. DO NOT WASTE TIME. You can buy a quality screen cleaner from most corner/liquor/convenience stores. Just go walk down the street instead please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It causes scratching my laptop screen( See photos)
customer_reviews.text: It scratched my Mac screen and cause damage to it. I did not have these defects on my screen before! So I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Ali

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: The screen mom cleaner is a natural cleaner with no chemical odor. I ordered the 2oz. bottle. That doesn't sound like much but it lasts quite awhile and easily fits in my desk. I appreciate that it comes with a small cloth to clean eyewear, and a larger cloth to clean computer screens and TV's. The Screen Mom cleaner does a great job cleaning! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Helped me Fix other inferior screen cleaner streaks
customer_reviews.text: 6 Stars! I used a Monster Hd Screen cleaner. It left a milky residue that I could not get off for the life of me. Other products just seared it around and dry cloths would only remove the milky water marks with a lot of pressure (not ideal for an expensive flat screen). The Screen Mom cleaned my screens up to “out of the box” shine in a few minutes with very little pressure required.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: WOW is this good
customer_reviews.text: I usually never take the time out of my day to write amazon product reviews, unless the product just absolutely blows me away, and well this is one of those instances. I absolutely love screen mom. I love how almost 99% of the product is all natural ingredients! I love how there's no odors, and I love how this screen spray genuinely doesn't leave any streaks at all! This $9 spray is better than any screen cleaner I have bought from Best buy that is $20+. I use it to clean my mac book, my i phone, my apple watch, and even a small little LCD tv of mine. Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked surprisingly well. Had some really ugly monitors I had been coughing on for a couple of years. Just be careful - no fault of the product - that you don't scrub too hard. I see a new black scintillating hairline in the LCD which I think is a tear I caused. It's not noticeable with normal use, but definitely is there. Obviously, to do a better job at this review, I'd need to purchase a few new monitors, probably bigger than the ones I have now, to determine whether ..,uh...it...works? cleans those really big LCD monitors. I'm sure such a thing could be found on my publish wishlist in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jason The Catholic

customer_reviews.title: Safe & Easy
customer_reviews.text: This spray cleaner works incredibly well. Didn’t mess up our tv screen or our phones, which one review had us worried about. Tv screen now looks brand new and my phone has no fingerprints. I’ve noticed it’s also harder for the touch screen to re develop fingerprints! It was quick and effortless with the included cloth. Will be using on all my tech screens!
customer_reviews.author: Lex  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on the 2018 MacBook Air I have from my job. It was so filthy and this stuff cleaned it right up with no problem at all. i would definitely recommend it. just make sure you read the directions as i suspect that some of the people who had a bad experience with it didn't lol. Really easy to use just don't spray directly on the device.
customer_reviews.author: K. Small

customer_reviews.title: Love the cloths
customer_reviews.text: I like the included cloths more than anything. It's just nice to have dedicated cleaning cloths for my electronics. As far as the spray goes, there are no antibacterial properties so you're basically just cleaning your devices with water. You're probably better off creating your own cleaning solution with isopropyl alcohol. This is only worth it for the cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Left streaks on macbook screen
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product because of all the positive reviews and it was "Amazon's Choice." However, after following instructions and cleaning my screen, it just left my screen with streaks. I'm now afraid my brand new Mac Book pro screen has been compromised. I would not recommend this product for a mac book screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. No residue cleans awesome and comes with 2 rags 1 small end 1 large which is great. Only thing that could make this better is a small pouch or something to keep it in. I'm still using the box so everything stays together. Overall great product buy it don't spend less $ to be disappointed and don't spend more $ it's not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful!! Is all it says. I used on my flat screen TV, my PC screen, iPad and smart phone. Cleaned all effortlessly, and no streaking! I will definitely purchase again, and may even purchase for gifts! On top of all that, priced very reasonably!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Did not clean fingerprint smudges
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I have an HP laptop that my 6 year has been using for remote learning. Lots of little fingerprints! I bought this to clean the screen and it just doesn’t work. All his little fingerprints remain. I don’t think the cloth is microfiber either.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: bottle of water?
customer_reviews.text: the ingredients on the bottle says water and plants based cleaning agents. Not telling you what they are, yet they say if you get it in your eyes contact a physician. So what would I tell him, I got water in my eye and some unknown plant stuff....
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Better Use Spit
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad batch, but this stuff does nothing. It's like greasy, soapy water and it doesn't wipe away clean and leaves the screen dirtier than you start. I tried it on a PC monitor and a 60" LED TV. Junk. Threw it away already. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think this would work well. My computer was well spotted due to use and time since last cleaning. The directions included were specific. I followed them to clean my screen. It didn't take a ton of scrubbing or work to clean and dry the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my glasses, cell phones, tablets and computer/laptop monitors. I’ve used wipes previously but they are not moist enough to use for anything larger than my glasses or phone. This product is great and works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Whitecotton

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good spray for my monitors and 65" Samsung flatscreen tv. I tried so wipes that I got in a hurry at a retail store and they left these horrendous white film streaks. Found this and gave it a try. Worked amazing. No Streaks at all. Still got a decent ammount left after cleaning the 65", a 35" wide and a 21.5". Not bad, will definitely buy more as needed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Great product cleaned our ipads and Tv's of finger prints and smears.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month and have cleaned laptop screens, phone screens and a small tablet screen. It has worked great. Left no streaks and no damage. It's been great to keep my kids tablets screen less sticky and grimy. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Clean Your Screen
customer_reviews.text: Our screens were pretty grungy. This product helped clean our screens, but even with using it twice, it did not remove all the dirt and marks. It should work pretty well if you regularly clean your screens, but isn't a "miracle" cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Bee

customer_reviews.title: for a multitude of uses!! on and off brand.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it to clean everything from my laptop to my glasses to my TV. And it even helped me to install my IQ Shield screen protector after I installed the first one incorrectly and ran out of fluid. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: agirlandtwocats

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something for my iMac screen - FINALLY I found something that doesn't streak and is easy to use. I can't stand a dirty screen and all the stuff I used before streaked the hell out of everything. First time I am happy! YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Pricey.  Seems like I needed to use a lot, but, not a negative.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the first cleaner I have ever bought specifically for any screen, monitor. It seems like I had to use a lot, too much, for the only time I used it. (27" monitor.) Hence, the 3 stars. However, since I have nothing to compare it to, I cannot call that a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Gar

customer_reviews.title: Very good at cleaning, but still leaves streaks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this small bottle in July and use it 2-3 times per week. Getting close to empty, so since it is better than Windex or those dry wipe pads, I will re-order, but whether I use it light or heavy, or do it a second time or not, it still does not dry streak free. Just thought you should know.
customer_reviews.author: casualobserver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product because of a buzzfeed article. Prior to this product I had been using windex and a soft cloth. Well let me tell you, this product is worth every penny. My laptop and phone screens have NEVER been this clean. It is so easy to use and cuts through all the grime/grease and nastiness on my screens. I have already recommended this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Young

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for 2019 MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: While the solution clears away any debris from the screen, it actually creates more smudges and the screen itself looks even worse when turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Zorn bylisma

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly as advertised, cleaned up our screen perfectly and zero smudges or odd places. We have a lot of glare in our TV room, lots of windows and this made all of that glare and smudgyness go away. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: keeps my art computer clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge drawing monitor for digital art. This cleaner works great for the smudges and flecks that find their way on to the screen. I use it regularly. Doesn't streak and the cloths that come with are nice.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Does It's Job!
customer_reviews.text: Screen Mom sprays onto my computer screen and easily removes finger prints, dust, and grime so easily. The cloth, which comes with the spray, wipes the computer screen and my glasses sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product Removed the Water Lines from TV Screen
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it removed all the water lines from my flat screen TV. I tried everything then I found this product on Amazon and it worked like I a dream. I used on my laptop, Mac screen and TV and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Fabian

customer_reviews.title: A must needed product for touchscreen items
customer_reviews.text: I use this on everything from my touchscreen laptop, Ipad, or Iphone I use it for all of them and cleans it very well. Just make sure to let the towel dry out before storing it again so that way it is dry and there is no wet spots left over.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my screens
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it's supposed to: It cleans the splotches and goobers off my laptop, monitor, and scanner flatbed. Every document I scanned had a big black streak until I cleaned off the flatbed. Now it works perfectly. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle guy

customer_reviews.title: The best monitor and TV cleaner that money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Always leaves the surface super clean and streak free. Works much better than any other product. Cleaning is effortless, just squirt on the cloth and wipe. Have purchased multiple times. There's no reason to get anything else.
customer_reviews.author: IAMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love that it comes with a small cloth and a large cloth! Could use a dust remover (i mean they would be one time use but hey, it would be cool!) love it - absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot a research before purchasing and I would highly recommend! No streaks whatsoever and cleaned all the random prints, sprays, goop etc off the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Ah-mazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It cleaned my MacBook screen so well that I had to adjust the brightness! That’s not an exaggeration. I didn’t even know my screen was that dirty. I will definitely buy again, and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber E

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Took maybe 3-4 sprays of it to clean a 46 inch screen to a mirror finish. Nothing I've had before comes close. Definitely will be buying this from now on and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kianka

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Definetly cleans fantastically. My kids got ahold of colors and marked on my tv when i turned my head for 1 minute. So i used this and it was amazing. It got everything off with no scratches or anything what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher &Courtney Buie

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works amazing. I read a bunch of reviews and took some tips from some. I didn't use it on any warmed up electronics, I waited until they hadn't been used for a bit so it felt cool before cleaning. I also didn't spray the product on my electronics. I sprayed it on the towel provided then wiped the product down. I used it on my laptop and TV's. It works very well as long as it's used properly.
customer_reviews.author: jklo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My iPad screen was really dirty with grease and even some acrylic paint - now it looks like new!! I can't believe it. The screen is so shiny that I get dazzled by the reflection from the reading lamp behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time ordering this product. It works great. I have not been able to find a cloth or spray that worked well. Both the spray and cloth work well for this product. This is an edit to my original review. The other review stated that I did not receive the cloth with this (my second) purchase. I found the cloth in the box. So, it gets all 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bella33

customer_reviews.title: Streak free and BRILLIANT
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend buying this in BULK. Amazing product, my glasses haven’t been this clean since I bought them! Works wonders on tvs and computers too!!! Love the two sizes of cloth you get.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Saporta

customer_reviews.title: As advertized
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large cleaner kit for my computer and TV screens. Bought two of the small cleaner kits to give to my grown sons as Christmas gifts. I like the name.
customer_reviews.author: Maestrak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaner - will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I just ran out of the cleaner I had and was looking for something that could both clean my glasses and tech items. This stuff delivers! Cleaned both my phone and eyeglasses with no streaking, and has no nasty vinegar smell. Love it! Although I need to now buy the bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jade

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL GEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I found this gem. I have a touchscreen laptop and to be honest my screen was not the cleanest (I dont use the touchscreen feature ) but for some reason it was dirty. I tried to clean it before with dry a dry cloth and the dirt wont come off, I've always been a little hesitant to try any spray on it until I found this product and of course paid attention to the reviews and Im happy and pleased to say to say I AM LOVE WITH IT!! I used it for my glasses too btw. So I plan to repurchase once its finished
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Cambier

customer_reviews.title: This really works.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get rid of cat's marking my screen. First application only partially worked. But second time, it all came off. It is a wonderful prpduct. It worked so well for me. Truly surprised that this worked when nothing else would. Glad I gave it the second chance.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Screen Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this screen cleaner so much so that I have purchased several bottles for myself and for gifts. It does a great job keeping my computer screen clean and it's small enough that it fits in my computer bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked quickly and well
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten quite a bit of food and other detritus on my laptop screen working from home during shelter in place. This product quickly cleaned the screen
customer_reviews.author: Rea

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! With a six year old child and seven month old puppy at home, my computer screen sees endless finger and nose prints. This cleaner removed all of that, with no effort! Love both cloths that come with it as well. Great value, great product. Will definitely buy again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Clean At Last!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed! HDTV, computer screens, phones, all now much cleaner and brighter! Microcloths are perfect, good size and capability! Once again, thanks Mom
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Burchell

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well on the TV in our living room that I can't keep my children from touching with their nasty hands. Just a minute or two with this stuff and the TV looks just like new with no traces of PB&J left smeared all over the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, and does it well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use on my MacBook Pro (2016). It was very easy to use and didn't leave any residue or markings on my laptop screen. Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra big cloth. the little one is handy for the car or purse but I keep the big one at home for my computer screen and tablets since my little one is always touching the screen with his dirty hands!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer lerdsuwanrut

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Mom!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased numerous other products and they all leave streaks. This one doesn't, it leaves my laptop screen crystal clear and streak free!
customer_reviews.author: PhD Physical Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Decent but most alternatives are better.
customer_reviews.text: Package value is fine. It comes with two microfiber cloths. However, it doesn't even clean as well as the generic Insignia cleaner I bought at Best Buy. Hard sell.
customer_reviews.author: angelb

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Came with two different sized cloths. One for tablets the other for bigger screens like televisions. No streaks and got rid of fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: GroovieG

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: This screen cleaner works just like I was expecting. It cleaned my screen fast and I didn't need to rub strong, actually, I didn't rub at all, I just pass the towel softly. (It's is not recommended but, after that, I used the wet towel to clean my keyboard and works well.)There is no perfume. It's small, so you can easily carry in your backpack if you need it. It was also delivered really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom to use on her computer monitor, and it seems to work pretty well. Can't complain too much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this on all of my screens and on my glasses. It works great. Doesn't streak, and does very well with the oil from fingers.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no streaking or residue
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have used. No streaking. No residue. Works well on phone, TV and yes, computer screens. The small size lasts quite awhile. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: CPE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Cleaned up my lap top in no time. Very easy to use and cuts the grease in no time! Definately recommend for dirty screens!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize when I ordered it, that it was basically a spray bottle full of water. I mean technically it works but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no streaks
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it on my tv, phones, iPad and even glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Basic cleaner which works amazingly!! Great for its price and it comes with 2 different rag sizes which is very convenient!!! Love it will buy again and recommend to friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia M Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Good price, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This screen cleaner is decently priced, there is no harsh chemical smell and it does the job of cleaning the screens of my Apple products well. Highly recommend and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Dazhane Turman

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't cleaned mac in forever so was pretty bad. Tv was easier than mac but used cloth wet and dry. Worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Olandez

customer_reviews.title: Does Streak!!!
customer_reviews.text: this item does leave streaks but just go back and wipe with a microfiber towel and it will look brand new....

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Very quick yet super effective cleaner! After a couple sprays, I barely even had to apply any pressure. Tried it out on my iPad and my MacBook with equally stunning results. Will definitely purchase again once it runs out.

customer_reviews.text: I like this product, the screen after u clean it looks amazing!! And doesn’t affect the touch screen!

customer_reviews.text: This cleaner did a great job. Used it on my MacBook, Mac and iPhone and the results were great. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Clean well and lasts
customer_reviews.text: Great for all types of devices and comes with a lot of clothes too. Only takes a spray to get rid of fingerprints.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean my laptop screen and it works great. I wish it came with multiple small microfiber cloths instead of one small one and one that's just too big for anything I'd need it for, but that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a bit OCD about his electronics, especially his computer. He cleans it like 5 times a day, and he likes it. So if it works for his standards, it’ll work for you.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my 2019 Macbook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive to buy at first because of some of the negative reviews about screens being ruined. Someone mentioned that it shouldn;t affect 2019 Macbook Pro screens and they were right! Works great, don't be afraid to spray a generous amount a few times to get the smudges off. I had smudging from the silicone keyboard cover that I had been using and it all came off with Screen Moms!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my IPad Pro and IPhone. Small and easy to keep in my computer bag. This stuff is great! Cleans very well and is safe for electronics. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: Works well and price is right. Cleaning cloth is nice and soft, used with spray, no streaks.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for PC and laptop monitor and flat screen TV. No streaks or marks when you follow the easy directions. Two micro-fibre cloths are included--one smaller (for the laptop) and one bigger for the TV. I've been searching for a product like this...

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Your Screens
customer_reviews.text: Works well on all screened electronics. Tablets, phones, tv and touch screen radios in cars. Love that I can buy a smaller bottle because I rarely have to use it.
